Gorkem, 
could you provide steps to reproduce this?

I have pasted the following to my plugin.xml before creating the class file. And nicely PDE editor warned the class did not exist. Then I have tried to create the class by clicking the quick fix bubble on the editor and nothing happened and I had the stacktrace I have previously posted. I have not tested with any other extension points so I am not sure if it works the same way for all.

  <extension point="org.eclipse.wst.server.ui.editorPageSections">
      <section
         id="org.eclipse.jst.server.generic.ui.internal.editor.serverProperties"
         order="10"
         insertionId="org.eclipse.wst.server.editor.overview.right"
         typeIds="org.eclipse.jst.server.generic.*"
         class="org.eclipse.jst.server.generic.ui.internal.editor.ServerPropertiesEditorSection">
      </section>
   </extension>

Thanks,
This code has been updated since your build (I20060413-1718), I will mark as invalid since I can't reproduce.  Please download the lastest build (3.2RC6) and reopen this defect if it happens again.
